external_references.description: Counter Adversary Operations. (2025, July 2). CrowdStrike Services Observes SCATTERED SPIDER Escalate Attacks Across Industries. Retrieved October 13, 2025.
CISA. (2023, November 16). Cybersecurity Advisory: Scattered Spider (AA23-320A). Retrieved March 18, 2024.

objects.description: [Scattered Spider](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1015) has installed protocol-tunneling tools on VMware vCenter and adversary-controlled VMs, including Teleport.sh, Chisel (configured to communicate with trycloudflare[.]com subdomains), MobaXterm, ngrok, Pinggy, and Teleport.(Citation: CrowdStrike Scattered Spider JUL 2025)(Citation: CISA Scattered Spider Advisory November 2023)
